expression.saqlExpression: case when previous(sfbill__LineAmount__c) is null then "1" else "0" end

computedFields.name: GetMax_LineAmount
computedFields.description: Tags the TransactionLine with the max line amount as 1
computedFields.label: Get Max Line Amount

expression.saqlExpression: case when previous(Sum_Of_Quantity) is null then sfbill__Quantity__c else previous(Sum_Of_Quantity) + sfbill__Quantity__c end

computedFields.name: Sum_Of_Quantity
computedFields.description: Aggregate the Quantity for all transaction lines with respect to Transaction ID
computedFields.label: Sum Of TransLine Quantity
